nodes.text: Troughlyn was a Human male criminal who was imprisoned by the Galactic Republic in Belsavis prison, a prison facility on the planet Belsavis. A gang leader in the prison, Krolak was freed from imprisonment during the invasion of Belsavis in the Galactic War, and started selling various items to the forces of the Sith Empire in the Imperial Lodgement in the Minimum Security Section.
Gang Leader Troughlyn appears as a Social Items Vendor for Imperial players on Belsavis in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
